isKeyboard.desc: Last event was a keyboard one

isComposing.desc: Last event was a keyboard composing one

isPointer.desc: Last event was a pointer one (mouse or touch)

isMouse.desc: Last event was a mouse one

isTouch.desc: Last event was a touch one

isDrag.desc: Last event was a drag and drop one

isContext.desc: Last event was a context menu one

isPending.desc: Last event is in progress (start event without a cancel or end event)

preventClick.desc: Prevent next click event on a target element

target.desc: The element where it should prevent click
